# The Spirit of Captain Lotus-Vision

The Spirit of Captain Lotus-Vision is one of the hidden Key Items in The New West. The item can be found after defeating Captain Lotus-Vision within the chapter. However, he is pretty hard to find, unless you know where he is.
img_below_text: The Spirit of Captain Lotus-Vision can be found in the Pagoda Realm in The New West. Specifically, right next to the Upper Pagoda Shrine. Once you spawn at the shrine, turn around and look down to find a small gap in the rocks with some enemies kneeling.
